properties.name: rekognitionEndpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and Rekognition using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.

properties.name: lambdaEndpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and Lambda using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.

properties.name: snsEndpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and SNS using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.

properties.name: sesEndpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and SES using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.

properties.name: sqsEndpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and SQS using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.

properties.name: s3Endpoint
properties.description: If you use Amazon VPC to host n8n, you can establish a connection between your VPC and S3 using a VPC endpoint. Leave blank to use the default endpoint.
